item.title: 49ers Star Christian McCaffrey Gives ‘All Glory To God’ After Monday Night Football Win

item.title: Undermining America’s National Security Is Nothing New For Mark Kelly
item.description: For years, Sen. Mark Kelly, D-Ariz., has regularly undertaken actions that undermine America's national security.

item.title: Ken Burns Is Completely Wrong About the Iroquois
item.description: The Iroquois confederation wasn’t even a democracy. Leaders were selected by women elders, whose status was hereditary.

item.title: Are Americans a People with a Creed, or a Creed-Made People?
item.description: An argument from JD Vance’s nomination speech continues to stir debate.

item.title: The Countdown to Conflict with Venezuela Looks Nothing Like the Run-Up to the Iran Strikes
item.description: The Trump administration hasn’t been straight with the public in this case, and voters have noticed.

item.title: Trump may select new Fed chair by Christmas, Treasury Secretary Bessent says
item.description: President Trump is likely to select a new Federal Reserve chair before Christmas, Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said Tuesday.

item.title: A Blueprint for Ukrainian Surrender
item.description: The draft proposal represents a betrayal for Ukraine and a humiliation for the West.

item.title: Trump’s Terrorist Designation of Muslim Brotherhood Sends Right Message
item.description: Though it isn’t a sweeping designation for the entire organization, the administration has taken a good first step.

item.title: Comey, James Escape Justice For Now Thanks To Judicial Coup Against Presidential Power

item.title: Warmongers Dredge Up Neville Chamberlain (Again) To Bash Trump’s Ukraine Peace Negotiations

item.title: Rank-and-file Senate Democrats start fight over Schumer's midterm election strategy
item.description: A coalition of Democratic senators dubbed "The Fight Club" is challenging Senate Minority Leader Charles E. Schumer's midterm election strategy.
